TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BackingFieldConvention extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Conventions.IConvention, class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Conventions.INavigationAddedConvention, class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Conventions.IPropertyAddedConvention
Public Class BackingFieldConvention Implements INavigationAddedConvention, IPropertyAddedConvention
type BackingFieldConvention = class interface IPropertyAddedConvention interface IConvention interface INavigationAddedConvention

summary.para: A convention that finds backing fields for properties based on their names: * <[property name]>k__BackingField * _[camel-cased property name] * _[property name] * m_[camel-cased property name] * m_[property name]
The field type must be of a type that's assignable to or from the property type. If more than one matching field is found an exception is thrown.
